sentences.en: $200 for all that work? It’s an insult.
sentences.cn: 干那么多工作才给200美元？这简直是侮辱。

sentences.en: 200 for all that work? It’s an insult.
sentences.cn: 文例句：干那么多工作才给200美元？这简直是侮辱。

sentences.en: Forgive me, I don't mean to insult you.
sentences.cn: 请原谅，我并非有意侮辱你。

sentences.en: He felt the smart of their insult for many days.
sentences.cn: 他受到他们的侮辱后好多天都感到难受.

sentences.en: He was roused to anger by the insult.
sentences.cn: 他由于受到侮辱而被激怒.

sentences.en: He was still steaming over the insult he had received.
sentences.cn: 他仍在为他所受的侮辱发怒.

sentences.en: His insult really put me on my ear.
sentences.cn: 他的侮辱确实使我恼火.

sentences.en: His insult was intentional.
sentences.cn: 他的侮辱是有意的.

sentences.en: I can't sit down with that insult.
sentences.cn: 我不能忍受那种侮辱.

sentences.en: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
sentences.cn: 如果我不来，希望安迪不要介意。

sentences.en: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
sentences.cn: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.en: She spat the name out like an insult.
sentences.cn: 她像骂人似的说出了那个名字。

sentences.en: She was enraged at his insult.
sentences.cn: 她被他的侮辱激怒了.

sentences.en: She was shouting insults at her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 她正对她的男朋友高声辱骂。

sentences.en: The insult drove him out of his senses.
sentences.cn: 这种侮辱使他气得发疯.

sentences.en: The insult made him go mad as a March hare.
sentences.cn: 这种侮辱把他给气疯了.

sentences.en: The insult rankled in his mind.
sentences.cn: 这种侮辱使他心里难受.

sentences.en: Their offer was so low I took it as an insult (= thought it was meant to be an insult ).
sentences.cn: 他们的出价太低，我认为是一种侮辱。

sentences.en: They would not stomach such an insult.
sentences.cn: 他们不会忍受这样的侮辱.

sentences.en: To call a brave man a coward is an insult.
sentences.cn: 把勇士称为懦夫是一种侮辱.

sentences.en: You will insult her if you don't go to her party.
sentences.cn: 你要是不去参加她举办的聚会,就对她太无礼了.

words.tran_cn: 侮辱的，无礼的；污蔑的；损害人体的

phrases.tran_cn: 伤害之外又加侮辱；雪上加霜

trans.tran_en: a remark or action that is offensive or deliberately rude
to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
